overview: After a long time, newlywed couple Ju Hee and Han Gi will travel to a remote place, where they will reunite with Ga Young, a woman of the past who Han Gi had completely forgotten about. It's a vague memory of the past, unlike Han Gi that lets it go and enjoys a vacation with his wife, Ga Young's temptation grows day by day. As this maddening obsession continues, on the empty campground or better said a human farm, Han Gi couple is suffocating for clothing, food and shelter and Han Gi was tamed by Ga Young and turned into a physical slave.
title: Camping Village Wife
